name: Hiroshi Tanaka
title: Data Scientist & Visualization Expert
bio: I'm a data scientist and visualization expert specializing in creating interactive tools that make AI systems more interpretable and accessible. With over 8 years of experience at the intersection of AI, data visualization, and UX design, I help organizations turn complex data into intuitive visual experiences.

videoIntro.title: Quick Introduction
videoIntro.description: A brief 30-second introduction to my work and expertise in AI visualization
